hiveArticle.title: Food Photography - Meal With Live Football Screening
hiveArticle.body:
Today went to watch France vs Denmark game in GLocal Junction Restaurant in Bangalore. They had quite a good offers going on while the match was screening. Being a vegetarian and non alcoholic, the choices are limited even though they had quite a good variety of veg food and mock-tails.

I ordered Bruschetta which is an Italian dish, consisting of grilled bread and having toppings of olives, tomato, onion and cheese.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZrVoDTAfFZaoDVMbocQzwoPQLCMGDZZC48h8K7PbfaZV/image.png)

I also ordered Chilly Paneer Pizza, which was quite yumm. 

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVsmn9rpuMfVZou3ivNJ8jTpzJLG86NzNZK74w894NAro/image.png)

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaepo3W1hJ2LyAYyv93j8EMnVQmPy9LipbB46YgwETHRH/image.png)

And last but not the least A Dessert to satisfy taste bud, Paan (Betel) Cheese Cake.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXqG1tyUvi3PqmLuvwsyPydSkgnPzLnbqg7iTt55TWbMV/image.png)

### Camera : Nokia 6
